TopicTitle: How to look around in BeamNG Drive?

Articles.Content: If any of you have this game, can you help me please!?My laptop doesn't have a numpad. So, I tried to config the look around key commands to the WASD keys, and when I tried it, if I pressed one key, the view would continue to orbit around the vehicle without stopping. How can I be able to look around normally, and without a numpad?
